data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yasunaga, Tomohide, Schwartz, Michael D., Aukema, Berend (2012): Availability and type depository of twelve Japanese plant bug species (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae). Zootaxa 3478: 111-112, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282238
